hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:At the time of the Fajr prayer the Prophet (ï·º) asked Bilal, "Tell me of the best deed you did after embracing Islam, for I heard your footsteps in front of me in Paradise." Bilal replied, "I did not do anything worth mentioning except that whenever I performed ablution during the day or night, I prayed after that ablution as much as was written for me
